org.terrier.structures.postings.integer

Class FieldIntegerCodingIterablePosting

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.postings.integer.BasicIntegerCodingIterablePosting
      • org.terrier.structures.postings.integer.FieldIntegerCodingIterablePosting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, FieldPosting, IterablePosting, Posting
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockFieldIntegerCodingIterablePosting

    public class FieldIntegerCodingIterablePosting
extends BasicIntegerCodingIterablePosting
implements FieldPosting
    An IterablePosting implementation, which can optionally support Fields
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Matteo Catena
